014package org.jdbi.v3.freemarker;
015
016import java.util.Optional;
017
018import freemarker.cache.ClassTemplateLoader;
019import freemarker.template.Configuration;
020import freemarker.template.Template;
021import org.jdbi.v3.core.locator.internal.ClasspathBuilder;
022
023/**
024 * Locates SQL in {@code .sql.ftl} Freemarker files on the classpath.
025 */
026public class FreemarkerSqlLocator {
027    /**
028     * @deprecated don't use static scope
029     */
030    @Deprecated
031    private static final Configuration CONFIGURATION;
032
033    private final FreemarkerConfig config;
034
035    FreemarkerSqlLocator(FreemarkerConfig config) {
036        this.config = config;
037    }
038
039    static {
040        Configuration c = new Configuration(Configuration.DEFAULT_INCOMPATIBLE_IMPROVEMENTS);
041        c.setTemplateLoader(new ClassTemplateLoader(selectClassLoader(), "/"));
042        c.setNumberFormat("computer");
043        CONFIGURATION = c;
044    }
045
046    private static ClassLoader selectClassLoader() {
047        return Optional.ofNullable(Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader())
048            .orElseGet(FreemarkerSqlLocator.class::getClassLoader);
049    }
050
051    /**
052     * @deprecated this static method does not respect configuration, use {@link FreemarkerConfig#createLocator()}
053     */
054    @Deprecated
055    public static Template findTemplate(Class<?> type, String templateName) {
056        return findTemplate(CONFIGURATION, type, templateName);
057    }
058
059    public static Template findTemplate(Configuration config, Class<?> type, String templateName) {
060        String path = new ClasspathBuilder()
061            .appendFullyQualifiedClassName(type)
062            .appendVerbatim(templateName)
063            .setExtension("sql.ftl")
064            .build();
065
066        try {
067            return config.getTemplate(path);
068        } catch (Exception e) {
069            throw new IllegalStateException("Failed to load Freemarker template " + templateName + " in " + path, e);
070        }
071    }
072
073    public Template locate(Class<?> type, String templateName) {
074        String path = new ClasspathBuilder()
075            .appendFullyQualifiedClassName(type)
076            .appendVerbatim(templateName)
077            .setExtension("sql.ftl")
078            .build();
079
080        try {
081            return config.getFreemarkerConfiguration().getTemplate(path);
082        } catch (Exception e) {
083            throw new IllegalStateException("Failed to load Freemarker template " + templateName + " in " + path, e);
084        }
085    }
086}
